article.headline: Holy Cross 66, Army 29
article.story: WEST POINT, N.Y. (AP) -- Kevin Hamilton and Keith Simmons each scored 18 points to propel Holy Cross to a 66-29 victory over Army Wednesday night. Trailing 12-11 with 12:30 left in the first half, Holy Cross (9-5, 1-1 Patriot League) opened the game up with a 15-3 run, fueled by four points each from Hamilton and Torey Thomas. Holy Cross started the second half on a 22-7 run over the first 11 minutes, with Hamilton scoring the first six points of the run and Simmons capping it with seven consecutive field goals, including a breakaway dunk. The Black Knights (2-12, 0-2) hit just 9 of 46 shots for the game while Holy Cross converted 50 percent of its shots, including 10 of 20 from 3-point range. Thomas finished with nine points, eight rebounds, three assists and three steals. Jimmy Sewell scored 11 points and grabbed seven rebounds for the Black Knights.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
